typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The end time cannot be in the past"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Locks GNO inside this contract and mints OWL for GNO if endTime is not past
 @param amount Amount of GNO to lock
nodes.name: lockGNO

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "It's not allowed to withdraw during the locking time"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "It's not allowed to withdraw during the locking time"
